question: Who among the following was awarded the highest Vishwa Bharati Award of Uttar Pradesh Sanskrit Sansthan for the year 2019-20?
explanation: Vishwa Bharti Award is the highest award of the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh Sanskrit Sansthan which is located in Lucknow. The award is given for outstanding contributions in the field of literature in Sanskrit, Pali and Prakrit. Dr. Chandkiran Saluja was awarded for the year 2019-20.
